|brand = Linksys |model = EA6350 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = 14Y1 |fcc_id = Q87-EA6350 |icid = 3839A-EA6350 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141911620010J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47081A0;BCM47081A0KFEBG, TT1309 P10, 271691-06 B1B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58BVG0S3HTA00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6GC16EWXD-12H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 48:F8:B3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;SKY85405, 441EJ, 1441 MY;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/19/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00KF93DMI |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00QR6UR2W |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG, TT1335 P20, 313918 3 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, HT1339 P10, 322811 6 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141'''9116'''20010J REV:01", "RoHS", and the new '''Linksys''' logo appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA52967|06/25/2014}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hkepc.com/13127 On '''hkepc''']
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The FCC docs show two differing power supplies... *'''Asian Power Devices''' WA-24E12FU (fixed plug) *'''Asian Power Devices''' WA-24E12 (interchangable plug)
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = WA-24E12FU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.65 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 |countrymanuf = China }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Asian Power Devices |model = WA-24E12 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.65 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA-15P (removable) |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China }}
